name: 13 Cells: 10 x 13 Block puzzle
description:
13 Cells - this is an addicting puzzle game.

Arrange the shapes in such a way to create lines horizontally or vertically and delete them. Do not let the figures fill the entire screen.
When a line with 13 cells or more is deleted, you will see a button with an inscription 13 with which you can select any shape.

Good luck :)
